Hostel Facilities at Reva University
At Reva University, we understand the importance of a conducive living environment for our students, faculty, and guests. Our hostel facilities are designed to provide a comfortable and enriching experience for everyone.
For Students: Our student hostels are more than just a place to stay; they are a home away from home. We offer well-furnished rooms with modern amenities. Each hostel is equipped with Wi-Fi, ensuring students have access to the internet for their academic pursuits. Safety and security are paramount, and we have 24/7 surveillance to ensure a secure living environment.
A common area provides a space for students to relax, socialize, and engage in recreational activities. Additionally, we have dedicated study spaces to promote a conducive learning atmosphere.
For Professors and Non-Teaching Staff: We understand the need for a peaceful and comfortable living space for our esteemed faculty members. Our quarters are designed to offer privacy and convenience. Each unit is equipped with essential amenities to cater to the needs of our faculty and non-teaching staff.
For Guests: We extend our hospitality to guests from both the student community and the university. Comfortable and well-appointed rooms are available for short stays. Whether it's family members visiting students or distinguished guests visiting the university, we ensure a pleasant stay.
Our hostel facilities are managed by a dedicated team committed to ensuring a hassle-free experience for all residents. We believe that a comfortable living environment contributes to a holistic educational experience.
At Reva University, we aim to create a sense of belonging and community within our hostels, fostering personal growth and academic excellence.
